item.title: How Workers for Platforms works
item.description: How Workers for Platforms worksWorkers for Platforms is built on top of Cloudflare Workers. The same security and performance models apply to applications that use Workers for Platforms. Workers for Platforms extends the capabilities of Workers for SaaS businesses that want to deploy Worker scripts on behalf of their customers or that want to let their users write Worker scripts directly. ​â€‹ Architecture Workers for Platforms introduces a new architecture model as outlined on this page.
